document_data.mainbody:
Blas Iwan was a young red dragon who sought to transform into a dracolich around 1370 DR.
Blas was a fanatical worshiper of Sammasters theories and entered the Cult of the Dragon thinking this was his destiny. However, he was too young to undergo the dracolichs transformation, so the Cult decided to helped him gain a treasure hoard and experience before the treatment.
